description: This is a market on who will win in the CryptoChamps match-up between Robert Leshner and Anthony Pompliano, scheduled to take place on June 12 or June 13, 2021. The market will resolve to “Leshner” if Robert Leshner wins, or “Pompliano” if Anthony Pompliano wins. If the match is a draw, the market will resolve to 50 cents Leshner and 50 cents Pompliano. If the match is postponed to a day on or before June 30, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a day after June 30, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to 50 cents Leshner and 50 cents Pompliano. More information on the tournament is here https://www.chess.com/news/view/chesscom-cryptochamps-powered-by-coinbase. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
